00003 #include "CPlatform.h"
00004 
00005 #define PLATFORM_MOVE   0
00006 #define PLATFORM_WAIT   1
00007 
00008 #define PLATFORM_WAITTIME       50
00009 #define PLATFORM_MOVE_SPD       23
00010 
00011 #define PLATFORM_ANIM_RATE      15
00012 
00013 #define PLATFORMPUSHAMOUNT      40
00014 
00015 CPlatform::CPlatform(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00016   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player) :
00017 CObject(p_map, x, y, OBJ_PLATFORM),
00018 m_Player(Player)
00019 {
00020  animframe = 0;
00021  animtimer = 0;
00022  movedir = RIGHT;
00023  state = PLATFORM_MOVE;
00024 
00025  blockedl = blockedr = false;
00026  inhibitfall = 1;
00027  needinit = 0;
00028  canbezapped = 1;
00029  SetAllCanSupportPlayer(1);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void CPlatform::process()
00033 {
00034  sprite = (g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode()==2) ? OBJ_PLATFORM_DEFSPRITE_EP2 : OBJ_PLATFORM_DEFSPRITE_EP3;
00035  sprite += animframe;
00036 
00037  if (animtimer > PLATFORM_ANIM_RATE)
00038  {
00039   animframe ^= 1;
00040   animtimer = 0;
00041  }
00042  else animtimer++;
00043 
00044  switch(state)
00045  {
00046  case PLATFORM_MOVE:
00047 
00048   if (movedir==RIGHT)
00049   {
00050    if (blockedr || getXRightPos() > (mp_Map->m_width<<CSF) )
00051    {
00052     movedir = LEFT;
00053     waittimer = 0;
00054     state = PLATFORM_WAIT;
00055    }
00056    else
00057    {
00058     moveRight(PLATFORM_MOVE_SPD);
00059    }
00060   }
00061   else if (movedir==LEFT)
00062   {
00063    if (blockedl || getXLeftPos() < (2<<CSF) )
00064    {
00065     movedir = RIGHT;
00066     waittimer = 0;
00067     state = PLATFORM_WAIT;
00068    }
00069    else
00070    {
00071     moveLeft(PLATFORM_MOVE_SPD);
00072    }
00073   }
00074   break;
00075  case PLATFORM_WAIT:
00076   if (waittimer > PLATFORM_WAITTIME)
00077   {
00078    state = PLATFORM_MOVE;
00079   }
00080   else waittimer++;
00081   break;
00082  }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void CPlatform::SetAllCanSupportPlayer(bool state)
00086 {
00087  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00088  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00089  {
00090   cansupportplayer = state;
00091   if(!state && it_player->supportedbyobject)
00092   {
00093    it_player->pfalling=true;
00094    it_player->moveDown(1);
00095    it_player->blockedd=false;
00096   }
00097  }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void CPlatform::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00101 {
00102  if(hitdetect(theObject))
00103  {
00104   // push player horizontally
00105   if( theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER )
00106   {
00107    CPlayer &Player = dynamic_cast<CPlayer&>(theObject);
00108    if(Player.pfalling or !Player.blockedd or !Player.supportedbyobject)
00109     Player.push(*this);
00110    else if( state == PLATFORM_MOVE )
00111     Player.moveXDir( (movedir==LEFT) ? -PLATFORM_MOVE_SPD : PLATFORM_MOVE_SPD);
00112   }
00113  }
00114 }
